description:
Ayumi’s art class photos earn her more than she bargained for after they’re sold.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aien Koen / Hito ni wa Soute Miyo, Tora to wa Tatakatte Miyo
An Uncanny Relationship Formed by a Tiger / Stay with a Person to Learn About the Person, Fight with a Tiger to Learn About the Tiger
合縁虎縁 / 人には沿うてみよ, 虎とは闘ってみよ
